meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rachel Samberg Sarah Olson Jerry Slowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6744.

td.p: Rachel Samberg, an academic tutor and performer from New York, New York
Sarah Olson, a project coordinator from El Cerrito, California
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 5-day cash winnings total $121,800)

tr.td: JANUARY HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
JOINING THE TV CAST LATER
WORLD OF FACTS
JOE PARTY
BASS
"ACK" WORDS
